title: 15 Charming Illustrations That Fight Fatphobia With Doodles And Flowers
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Teen - Today 
Fat-positive feminist and artist Rachele Cateyes is fed up with [people's] fatphobic bullsh*t. So she decided to draw about it. In her illu...
